original: Klingspor, Carl Mauritz Bogislaw, friherre, kammarherre, öströö. Tvååker, f. 30/10/87 å Råbäck, Skarab. I, av hovmarskalk., frih. Carl K. o. fri-h:an Louise Silfverschiöld. G. 21 m. grev:an Carin Hamilton. Barn: Agneta f. 23, Baltzar 25, Eva 31. — Mog:-ex. 07, res :off :’ex. 09, kansliex. i Upps. 10, stud. v. Sthlms högsk. o. HHS 12-14, fil. kand. 14, elev v. Ultuna lant-br :,sk. 16, Dr. pbik v. univ. i Greifs-w^ald 34. Und:löjtn. i Livg. t. häst res. 09, löjtn. 14, ryttm. 27. Attaché v. sv. konsul, i Hamburg o. Kairo 10-12, tjg. kammarjunk. v. H. M. Konungens hov 14, kammarh. 23. Äger o. ’bebor Öströö sät. i Hall. 1. sed. 16 samt Bäddarö i Uppll., därjämte deliäg. i Stora Sund-by, Södermani. 1., samt Österäng i Västergötl. Sed. flera år ordf. i kom-m:stämma o. valnd, led. av kyfko- o. skolråd, suppl. t. riksd. första kamm. en period, fd. ordf. i HaU. nat. ting-d:förb. samt i Mellersta Hali. lant-bnklubb, ordf. i styr. f. A-B Svecia-trade, v. ordf. i stift. Drottningholms teatermus., styr :led. i Ställbergs Gruv A-B, Idkerbergets Gruv A-B. A-B
translated: Klingspor, Carl Mauritz Bogislaw, baron, chamberlain, owner of Öströö estate. Born on 30/10/87 in Råbäck, Skaraborg. Son of Court Marshal Baron Carl K. and Baroness Louise Silfverschiöld. Married on 21 to Countess Carin Hamilton. Children: Agneta born in 1923, Baltzar in 1925, Eva in 1931. Divorced in 1907, reserve officer from 1909, office clerk in Uppsala in 1910, student at Stockholm University and the School of Economics from 1912 to 1914, graduated with a Bachelor of Arts in 1914, student at Ultuna Agricultural School in 1916, PhD from Greifswald University in 1934. Second lieutenant in the Life Guards Cavalry Reserve from 1909, lieutenant in 1914, cavalry officer in 1927. Attaché at the Swedish Consulates in Hamburg and Cairo from 1910 to 1912, serving as a court page to His Majesty the King in 1914, chamberlain in 1923. Owner and resident of Öströö estate in Halland since 1916, as well as Bäddarö in Uppland. Also co-owner of Stora Sundby in Södermanland and Österäng in Västergötland. Former chairman of various committees and electoral boards, member of church and school councils, substitute member of the First Chamber of the Parliament for a period, former chairman of the Halland County National Association and the Central Halland Agricultural Society. Vice chairman of A-B Sveciatrade, board member of Ställbergs Mining Company, Idkerberget Mining Company, and A-B.
